title: Gabrielle Union and Kaavia are (t)winning Halloween in matching Clovers uniforms
text:
Cape Town – Just when we thought Kaavia James pretty much won spooky season, her mom posted an image of the two (t)winning in the iconic Clovers uniform from Bring It On.

In the 2000 film, the 46-year-old played a member of the Toro's rivalling cheerleading squad, the Clovers. One of the more memorable scenes in the movie is the Clovers' cheer Brr! It's Cold In Here!.

The Being Mary Jane actress posted that very scene from the film as well as few shots of her and Kaavia in their fiercest Clovers pose on Instagram. She captioned one post, "Ice Ice Ice... It's COLD asf."

Below another, she wrote, "Brought it."

SEE THE POSTS HERE:

Gabrielle Union and former NBA player, Dwayne Wade have been together since 2009 and celebrated their five-year wedding anniversary in August.

After three years of trying to conceive, the couple were happy to announce that they welcomed their first child together, Kaavia James, via surrogate in November 2018.

"We are sleepless and delirious but so excited to share that our miracle baby arrived last night via surrogate and 11/7 will forever be etched in our hearts as the loveliest of all the lovely days. Welcome to the party sweet girl!" she wrote on Instagram.

Compiled by Bashiera Parker (Sources: Instagram, Channel24) (Photo: Instagram/gabunion)
description: Brr! It's Cold In Here! There must be some Clovers in the atmosphere...
